title: Carry me to gold
body:
Went from s2 - b1 in the last week after sitting comfortably in high silver all year.

I need some solid duo partners because yoloq is a nightmare right now - either feeders on my team or smurf duos on theirs.

Probably bottled any chance of gold with my epic loss streak, but I'm not giving up just yet.

Hit me up in game if you are keen to duo.

(moved to team recruitment because reasons).

UPDATE: B3 now. The plunge continues.

replies.body: If you dropped down to Bronze 3 you need to stop playing rank reevaluate and ask yourself how you dropped this low.

I believe it was hard core tilt and negativity, and reacting to dipshits in chat.

Turned my attitude around a bit. Has made a big difference. 

Won 7 out of my last 10 games and carried a lot of them. the losses were when I was negative or the team was flaming me (had two bad lanes each go 0/3 before 8 mins and they blamed jg (me) and that tilted me hard. But then I recognised the issue (my reaction to their stupidity) and am doing my best to be more positive. Making a big difference.

yeah I cant take a trick at the moment. Just cant seem to get a win at all.... Tilting so hard. Have pretty much given up on gold after coming so close most of the season. At this rate I'll be lucky if I get silver...

I dropped down to bronze 1 2lp before and climbed my way up in less than 3 hours by being very aggressive. If you really want to get silver you just have to NOT GIVE A F*CK ABOUT YOUR TEAM!  Focus on your lane, by beating your lane opponent on kills, assist and cs by any means (That means don't play support).  Also not giving a f*ck about your teammates mean if they flame you, don't respond back or if they feed don't respond or care about them. Of course i don't recommend doing this, but this is the easiest mindset if you really want to climb back to silver fast.
But hey if you can't do it then maybe you deserved bronze :P {{item:3070}}

"never rely on your teammates in bronze elo" - high level LoL players
either you become a hero or zero

well im a top main, ive been sitting in low bronze all season and now im s4 im happy to bring someone along the trip if your happy playing with a tank top players. xD mundo is pretty much free LP but u know all the vayne mains make it difficult to continue im happy to duo. im a pretty dedicated player aswell just losing my mojo every now and then when i soloq and dont get top :/
Happy to duo man. but I'm like the opposite of king midas at the moment. Everything I touch turns to shit.

Hey, I am struggling with your exact problem too. I just need some help or some better teams to get out of this shitty ass Bronze elo. I wouldn't mind coming along with you as well, if you would want to, of course. Because just like you, I am done with this shitty elo. Also, I am a top main, however I don't mind playing any role (even support! Woah! I know!).
If you're interested, my summoner's name is: BrodaCorn
Goodluck with getting out of silver! :D
Thanks mang maybe we can have a hit sometime. good luck to you too.

The dream is dead. Although I've climbed 2 divisions I've got no time left to climb back into silver as tonight is the last chance I have to play before end of season.

Fml.
Same here at the moment, most of my match history is just red right now and I've honestly just given up for Gold. I'm so sad I won't get the Victorious Mao'Kai skin...
Getting me some good wins on vi atm. Time is running out but i will keep trying ( for silver).
dont bother its only shitty victorious maokai not like your missing out on a good skin

I was so salty about missing victorious siv last year.

But tbh I want more for the border than the mao skin. My ego needs stroking.
